alert.note: Alert for Kittitas Valley; Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 9:30AM PST until January 06 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Kittitas Valley and Yakima Valley. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.
